about_the_game:
Dark Prison 7th is a VR escape game with some horror elements. Dark Prison 7th has very simple rules. You just need to reach the 7th floor of the prison, where the exit is!

Explore and observe the endlessly repeating prison interior spaces.

[Single Player]

The game supports first-person single player mode.

[Elevator]

If nothing is wrong in the prison, take the elevator going up.

However, if anything has changed from the beginning, take the elevator going down!

If you make the wrong choice, you will return to the very first floor.

[Immersion]

You will be immersed in realistic graphics and a spooky atmosphere.

Players can use the 'headlight' to illuminate their surroundings.

[Various Gimmicks]

Dark Prison 7th has a total of 28 paranormal phenomena. Pay attention to ambient noise, objects, and even people. Never let your guard down.

It will be quite difficult and scary.

I sincerely hope you make the right choice.

name: Dark Prison 7th

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: RAM 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Super / AMD 400 Series
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: DDR4 RAM 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 20 Series/ AMD Radeon RX 6000 Series
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR

short_description: You are trapped alone in a mysterious prison. After carefully examining your surroundings, you must take the elevator to reach the 7th floor of the prison. However, if you notice any anomalies, take the elevator down. Escape from the prison filled with strange phenomena!
supported_languages: English, German, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
